channel.title: meta on Sivert Does Stuff Online!
channel.description: Recent content in meta on Sivert Does Stuff Online!

item.title: IT Apprentice
item.author: gmail@sivert.pw (Sivert V. Sæther)
item.description: This page on my blog serves as an index of technologies I’ve learned or became better at while working as an apprentice in IT. 😀 It also serves the purpose of the required documentation apprentices in Norway are supposed to do. 🤠 😳 It’s mostly in relation to stuff learned at SkyLabs AS where we run a captive portal service. But there is also some stuff from Sircon AS. Those guys run hosting services, with a focus on cPanel/WordPress shared hosting.

item.title: About
item.author: gmail@sivert.pw (Sivert V. Sæther)
item.description: This webpage is my portfolio webpage and blog. 🌀 It’s build with hugo and hosted on github.io with GitHub Pages! 😎

item.title: Siverts Tech Adventure Blog
item.author: gmail@sivert.pw (Sivert V. Sæther)
item.description: Here you are welcome to take a look at all my blog posts! 🌀 And be sure to add the RSS feed to your news reader! 😉

item.title: Welcome!

item.description: So I guess I’ve finally got to updating my github.io site. Nice! 😁
